FuncDef: This command creates a profile for the user to configure the egress QoS parameters of an MLFR bundle or an FRF.12 UNI/NNI link. A maximum of 128 egress QoS profiles may be created on the system.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the profile number. Values-1 to 65535.
Required parameter when creating a multi-class Frame Relay egress profile.
